titles.title: Seek Ye First The Kingdom Of God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Seek ye first the kingdom of God and His righteousness
And all these things shall be added unto you
Ha-lle-lu-jah.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ask and it shall be given unto you, seek and ye shall find
Knock and it shall be opened unto you
Ha-lle-lu-jah.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Man shall not live by bread and bread alone, but by every word
That proceeds from the mouth of the Lord,
Hallelu, Hallelujah.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Busca primero el reino de Dios
Y su justicia perfecta.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Y lo demas a√±adido sera, alelu-aleluya.
No solo de pan el hombre vivira,

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Sino de toda palabra, que sale de la boca de Dios,
Alelu-aleluya.
